Can you look and read the brief first before.', attach: 'attach', time: '12:45 PM', read: 'bg-lightblue theme-light-bg' }, ] class Email extends Component { render() { return (
    {emailList.map((value , index) => (
  • {value.name}

    {value.time}
    • ))}
); } } export default Email;
